name: Chiclets Race
description:
This game was created for the Nexus Game Jam, with the theme being "Changing Perspective". The idea here is that you're either the one being chased or the one chasing the other player that carries the mirror, found after the game starts.
This is a couch co-op game, so make sure to get a friend and play with them!

This was a game made by myself and @kimonade. Thanks for playing!
